nodes.title: new blade samples from latest gradle templates
no need to run this on travis
Sync all maven repository URLs to use the same one
Update the `login.events.pre` details with description about other LifecycleEvents
Any output by diff tool will cause build failure
[maven] exlude sass-cache dir and ignore it
add jsp analyzer plugin to bundles with jsps
remove WEB-INF/lib since jsf is no longer a sample
don't import these packages that are not strictly needed.
remove liferay-ce repo and switch to cdn
only print out bundle if there are differences
FACES-2670 Removing old test builds for JSF
Copy boilerplate build files from portlet.jsp project
flip the args to make output more readable
flatten servicebuilder tree to match other toolchains
update stale markdown file.  there appears to be a bug in replicate sources that we need to fix
change blade samples test to testIntegration for CI
add copyright to screenname validator sample
re add aries dependencies for testing
use startTestableTomcat to start the portal
reformat bnd.bnd to minimize the textual differences
LRDOCS-3506 Replicate Javadoc edits to other build projects
LPS-70749 make service builder merge existing portlet-model-hints.xml
Pass in bladeURL to test jvm
Use entire cloudbees url for Blade Cli artifact
update SB version with version used by gradle-plugins
Change controlpanel sample to use JSP instead of Freemarker
update to latest css and theme builder
Run gradle build on test repo
bind to process-classes so the src/main/resources has already been copied over
update windows build.bat to match build.sh
BND bundle description for blade.corejsphook sample
set source encoding to UTF-8 always
LRDOCS-3017 Use standard bold chars for markdown READMEs
Remove bundles directory after test finishes
servlet-filter sample, with a portlet to list available filters
Change version of the liferay-npm-bundler from 1.2.2 to 1.6.0
Change dependency version numbers in metaljs blade template to avoid mixing metal versions
Update newer version of CSS Builder to fix LPS-74789
Add examples of the new npm support for portlets (covering all major JS frameworks)
BLADE-178, 179 Add JDBC and JNDI Service Builder Blade samples
update BSN in service builder test
fix build for maven and workspace
Add functional test for springmvc portlet, but ignored until we update JMXBundleDeployer
remove css files in maven to match other projects
skip ':test' as part of building test dependencies
